start: Board meeting my ass! Tonight I'm getting rid of our little ghost problem myself.
So, why am I locked in this room again?
That ghost is going to take control of you and then I'm going to banish it to Hell!
But, what if it picks you instead?
I've got a rabbit foot! I'm officially immune to possession!
HAhahaa, this plan is fool proof! Bring it, ghost!
A board meeting of all the CEOs? This train's headed for crazy town.
He can't actually banish me, can he?
With a rabbit's foot? Don't make me laugh. This board, however, I don't like the sound of that.
end: I should probably mention that your debt is almost completely paid off.
You'll let me stay here long enough to get my revenge though, right?
As long as you keep the bodies coming, you get to stay.
